description: The article 'Align The Misaligned' discusses the fragmentation of the internet and the importance of adapting to this change. It explores the concept of ecosystem architecture, which integrates ideas from various fields to create sustainable, decentralized, and regenerative systems. By valuing broken fragments, this approach aims to build resilient future networks and communities.
excerpt: The fragmentation of the internet reflects broader cultural shifts. Ecosystem architecture integrates diverse ideas to create sustainable, decentralized, and regenerative systems from fragmented pieces.
